meanings.definition: To give form or shape to something.
meanings.sent1: She gestaltened the clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: Artists often gestalten their ideas into stunning masterpieces.
meanings.sent3: The children tried to gestalten their sandcastle into a palace.
meanings.sent4: His words gestaltened a new vision in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor gestaltened the marble with skillful hands.

meanings.definition: The overall quality or character of something.
meanings.sent1: The gestalten of the painting was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The gestalten of the garden reflected harmony and beauty.
meanings.sent3: The gestalten of the party was lively and fun.
meanings.sent4: The gestalten of her outfit was elegant and sophisticated.
meanings.sent5: The gestalten of the music filled the room with joy.
